metadata.name: Information Alchemist Progress
metadata.description: Progress tracking for Information Alchemist, a UI for Building CIMs - A system where graphs are the fundamental building blocks of all domain models, composed through Applied Category Theory (ACT) principles. Every concept - from simple value objects to complex aggregates - is represented as a graph that can be composed with other graphs to build entire systems. ðŸŽ‰ PROJECT 100% COMPLETE - ALL 8 DOMAINS PRODUCTION-READY!
